testcase.name: To verify the secure code box should get cleare on backspace and delete button from the keyboard.
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to URL "https://drysign-qa.exela.global/#/"..................passed When enter the user name as "sid102@mailinator.com".........................passed When enter the password as"Malin@555".......................................passed And user click on the sign in button........................................passed And user click on continue with free version................................passed And user click on mat icon..................................................passed And user click profile icon.................................................passed When user click on security tab.............................................passed And user select on checkbox for setup secure code...........................passed Then user press delete button as "2"........................................passed
